topic.title: Death Report Document Body - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.1"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:48)/@code="69409-1" U.S. standard certificate of death - 2003 revision (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:49)
A code to indicate this is the section containing death reporting information.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:50)
The text entry is drawn from the structured content contained within the entries of this section. Text is required to provide human readible content.

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:51)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Date and Time of Death (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.13)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:52)
The report is expected to capture information about the physical location of death, either as an address or as a description.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Location of Death (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.10)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:53)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Death LocationType (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.8)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:54)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Certifying Death (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.7)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:55)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Manner of Death (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.11)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:56)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Pronouncing Death (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.15)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:57)
Note, the entry is required if the person is female and in the age range 5 to 75 years. In other cases, e.g., male decedent, the nullFlavor "NA", should be provided.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Pregnancy Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.12)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:58)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Tobacco Use (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.14)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:59)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Injury (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.9)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:60)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Death Causal Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.6)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:61)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Autopsy Performance (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.2)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:62)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Autopsy Results (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.3)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:63)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Coroner Referral (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.5)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:64)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Coroner Case Transfer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.4)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:48)/@code="69409-1" U.S. standard certificate of death - 2003 revision (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:49)
A code to indicate this is the section containing death reporting information.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:50)
The text entry is drawn from the structured content contained within the entries of this section. Text is required to provide human readible content.

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:51)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Date and Time of Death (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.13)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:52)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Location of Death (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.10)
The report is expected to capture information about the physical location of death, either as an address or as a description.

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:53)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Death LocationType (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.8)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:54)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Certifying Death (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.7)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:55)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Manner of Death (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.11)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:56)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Pronouncing Death (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.15)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:57)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Pregnancy Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.12)
Note, the entry is required if the person is female and in the age range 5 to 75 years. In other cases, e.g., male decedent, the nullFlavor "NA", should be provided.

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:58)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Tobacco Use (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.14)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:59)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Injury (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.9)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:60)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Death Causal Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.6)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:61)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Autopsy Performance (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.2)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:62)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Autopsy Results (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.3)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:63)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Coroner Referral (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.5)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:64)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Coroner Case Transfer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.4)
